pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiblock Exploratory and Predictive Data Analysis // Exploratory and predictive methods for the analysis of several blocks of variables measured on the same individuals. The methods included are: Multiblock Principal Components Analysis (MB-PCA), Common Dimensions analysis (ComDim), Multiblock Partial Least Squares (MB-PLS) regression and Multiblock Weighted Covariate analysis (MB-WCov). E. Tchandao Mangamana, V. Cariou, E. Vigneau, R. Gll Kaka, E.M. Qannari (2019) doi:10.1016/j.chemolab.2019.103856; E. Tchandao Mangamana, R. Gll Kaka, E.M. Qannari (2021) doi:10.1016/j.chemolab.2021.104388.
